original_text: they saw that his face was radiant. Then Moses would put the veil back over his face until he went in to speak with the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 모세의 얼굴의 광채를 보므로 모세가 여호와께 말하러 들어가기까지 다시 수건으로 자기 얼굴을 가렸더라

sentences.original_text: they saw that his face was radiant
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 얼굴이 빛나는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Then Moses would put the veil back
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모세는 다시 수건을 쓸 것이었다
